info.title: idocs api document
info.description:
Use the createVaultingSession API to create a vaulting session for integrating the client-side SDK. Alipay returns the encrypted session data through this API response. You can then use the session data to initiate the client-side SDK. The SDK facilitates the card vaulting process before initiating a payment. 

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see:

  • Request header
  • Response header

Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20".
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".
info.descriptionLake: The createVaultingSession API is used to create a vaulting session for client-side SDK integration. Through this API response, Alipay returns encrypted session data. You use the session data to initiate the client-side SDK. The SDK helps you complete the card vaulting process before a payment is initiated.

paymentMethodType.description: The type of payment method to be vaulted. The value of this parameter is fixed to CARD.
paymentMethodType.descriptionLake: The payment method type that is included in payment method options. See Payment methods to check the valid values for card payments.

vaultingRequestId.description: The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.
vaultingRequestId.descriptionLake: The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.
vaultingRequestId.x-idempotencyDescription: For vaulting requests that are initiated with the same value of vaultingRequestId and reach a final status of S or F, the same result is to be returned for the request.

vaultingNotificationUrl.description: The URL that is used to receive the vaulting result notification.
vaultingNotificationUrl.descriptionLake: The URL that is used to receive the vaulting result notification.

redirectUrl.description:
The merchant page URL that the buyer is redirected to after the vaulting process is completed.

Specify this parameter if you want to redirect the buyer to your page directly after the vaulting is completed.
redirectUrl.descriptionLake:
The merchant page URL that the buyer is redirected to after the vaulting is completed. 

Specify this parameter if you want to redirect the buyer to your page directly after the vaulting is completed.

merchantRegion.description:
The country or region where the merchant operates the business. The value of this parameter is a 2-letter country or region code based on the ISO 3166 Country Codes standard.

Some possible values are US, SG, HK, PK, JP, CN, BR, AU, and MY.

Specify this parameter when you use the Global Acquirer Gateway (GAGW) product.
merchantRegion.descriptionLake:
The country or region where the merchant operates the business. The value of this parameter is a 2-letter country or region code based on the ISO 3166 Country Codes standard.

Some possible values are US, SG, HK, PK, JP, CN, BR, AU, and MY.

Specify this parameter when you use the Global Acquirer Gateway (GAGW) product.

resultCode.description: The result code. The possible result codes are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.
resultCode.descriptionLake: Result code. The result code that might be returned are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.

resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:

  • S: indicates that the result status is successful.
  • F: indicates that the result status is failed. 
  • U: indicates that the result status is unknown.
resultStatus.descriptionLake:
Result status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that the result status is successful.
  • F: Indicates that the result status is failed. 
  • U: Indicates that the result status is unknown.

resultMessage.description: The result message that explains the result code.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: Result message that explains the result code.

result.description: The result of the API call.
result.descriptionLake: The result of the API call.

vaultingSessionData.description: The encrypted vaulting session data. Pass the data to your front end to initiate the client-side SDK.
vaultingSessionData.descriptionLake: The encrypted vaulting session data. Pass the data to your front end to initiate the client-side SDK.

vaultingSessionId.description: The encrypted ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a vaulting session.
vaultingSessionId.descriptionLake: The encrypted ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a vaulting session.

vaultingSessionExpiryTime.description: The specific date and time after which the vaulting session will expire.
vaultingSessionExpiryTime.descriptionLake: The specific date and time after which the vaulting session will expire.

x-result.action: The vaulting session is successfully created. No further action is needed.
x-result.actionLake: The vaulting session is successfully created. No further action is needed.

x-result.message: The required parameters are not passed, or illegal parameters exist. For example, a non-numeric input, an invalid date, or the length and type of the parameter are wrong.
x-result.action: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.
x-result.actionLake: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.

x-result.action: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.message: An API call has failed, which is caused by unknown reasons.
x-result.action: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.

post.x-more:
Result process logic 

After making an API request, Alipay responds to you with the result of the API call. The possible responses for result.resultStatus are:

  • S: indicates the API call succeeded. Get the vaulting status of the payment method by calling the inquireVaulting API or waiting for the notification from Alipay.
  • F: indicates the API call failed. For more information on why the call failed, see result.resultCode.
  • U: indicates the API call failed due to an unknown reason. Retry using the same request ID.
post.x-more-lake:
Result process logic 

After making an API request, Alipay responds to you with the result of the API call. The possible responses for result.resultStatus are:

  • S: indicates the API call succeeded. Get the vaulting status of the payment method by calling the inquireVaulting API or waiting for the notification from Alipay.
  • F: indicates the API call failed. For more information on why the call failed, see result.resultCode.
  • U: indicates the API call failed due to an unknown reason. Retry using the same request ID.
